subject: JUNIT-Addons Question
msgSnippet: Hi! I see a API for testing private methods in JUNITAddons through the class PrivateAccessor. In this there is a invoke method which takes object as param.
messageBody:
Hi!

I see a API for testing private methods in JUNITAddons through the class
PrivateAccessor. In this there is a invoke method which takes object as
param. Could any one tell me how to create the Object if the class being
tested is of package scope and the constructor is also of package scope.
My test code is in a separate package than this class.

e.g.
package com.xxx;
final class A
{
A()
{

}
}

----

Test code

package com.xxx.test;
public class TestA extends TestCase
{
..
}

Thanking you in advance.

Regards,
Nagendra
